Bike.Movement - Class in edu.rit.LightBikesClient
Runnable inner class which faciliates the systematic movement of the Bike in the GUI based on the time delay set in the Bike, the value of the Bike object's direction, and the gameState.

E

edu.rit.LightBikesClient - package edu.rit.LightBikesClient
LightBikesClient is the package of client side code and runs the game and GUI for each player.
edu.rit.LightBikesServer - package edu.rit.LightBikesServer
LightBikesServer is the package of server side code and runs the game server, chat server, and the server side GUI.

Begins movement of the this Bike object within the GUI, moving the Bike at the interval specifed in Bike.DELAY_IN_MILLIS and registering the changes with both the Grid and the NetworkConnector created by Grid.
